title: SAO Infinity Moment JPN (No English) PSP .iso
description:
Sword Art Online: Infinity Moment (Ã£â€šÂ½Ã£Æ’Â¼Ã£Æ’â€°Ã£â€šÂ¢Ã£Æ’Â¼Ã£Æ’Ë†Ã£Æ’Â»Ã£â€šÂªÃ£Æ’Â³Ã£Æ’Â©Ã£â€šÂ¤Ã£Æ’Â³ -Ã£â€šÂ¤Ã£Æ’Â³Ã£Æ’â€¢Ã£â€šÂ£Ã£Æ’â€¹Ã£Æ’â€ Ã£â€šÂ£Ã£Æ’Â»Ã£Æ’Â¢Ã£Æ’Â¼Ã£Æ’Â¡Ã£Æ’Â³Ã£Æ’Ë†- SÃ…ï¿½do Ã„â‚¬to Onrain: Infiniti MÃ…ï¿½mento?) is a video game based on the Sword Art Online light novel series. The game was released in both standard and limited edition box sets in Japan on March 14, 2013 for PlayStation Portable. The gameplay has many similarities to MMORPGs, though it is not an online game, including the ability to buy and upgrade weapons, go on missions, and fight in a group with other characters. The game follows an alternate storyline from the end of the first arc of the original story, in which a glitch causes Kirito and the other players to remain in Sword Art Online despite defeating Heathcliff, and players from other VMMORPGs such as Leafa and Sinon get sucked into the game themselves.

This is the Japanese version and there are no English patches/versions to my knowledge.  There is, however, apparently a translation here:
To be used if you need assistance with getting through all of the Japanese.

~I saw a torrent of this PSP iso on here, but it had no seeders, so I found this and decided to put it here.  Never put up a torrent before.

_______________________INSTALL_____________________________________
After downloading, extract using 7zip or Winrar.
There are multiple compressed files in the folder.
Extracting the first one to a target location should automatically extract and compile the others into a single folder.
Select the extracted content with the game using a PSP emulator and load it up.
It took a little bit to load for me.
Enjoy
